comments.content:
Pillow is now the preferred image manipulation library to use.
PIL hasn't seen any development since 2009.
https://pillow.readthedocs.org/about.html#why-a-fork

In my case I was installing openstack lodgeit in my internal machine and 
I got some error about installing PIL on debian with setup_tools. 
so I changed PIL with pillow and it worked. 

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/128895/
